story.text: PARIS Jan 2 French seamless metal tubes specialist Vallourec (VLLP.PA) on Tuesday said it had raised its stake in the Valtimet joint-venture with Timet to 95 percent by buying Timet's 43.7 percent for $75 million. Japan's Sumitomo Corp (8053.T) and Sumitomo Metal Industries 5405.T have the remaining 5 percent. Vallourec added that Titanium Metals Corp TIE.N (Timet) had renewed a long-term supply contract with Valtimet for titanium.
story.title: vallourec ups stake in valtimet joint venture
